LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerToothDecay.label: dental cavities
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerToothDecay.description: Painful cavities from eating too many sweets. Can be treated with medicine to reduce severity. Severe cavities require dental surgery extraction.
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerToothDecay.stages.0.label: minor cavities
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerToothDecay.stages.1.label: moderate cavities
LanguageData.RimTalk_ToddlerToothDecay.stages.2.label: severe cavities
LanguageData.RimTalk_MissingTooth.label: missing tooth
LanguageData.RimTalk_MissingTooth.description: A tooth was extracted due to severe decay. Will be replaced by adult teeth when the child matures.
LanguageData.RimTalk_MidnightSnackCooldown.label: midnight snack cooldown
